title: Google Covid-19 Game
goals: This project was an assignment for CSS Animations in college. The goal for this project was to build a fun interactive game with HTML, CSS and JavaScript that could be placed on the google homescreen.
description: The goal of the game is to collect as many toiletpaper and hand sanitizer as possible! But watch out, the virusses will try to touch you, be touched by 3 of them and its game over! The more points you collect, the harder the game will get, so stay focussed!
